00043 static TagHandle get_tag( Mesh* mesh,
00044                           unsigned num_matrices,
00045                           unsigned dimension,
00046                           const char* base_name,
00047                           bool orient_surface,
00048                           MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   unsigned matrix_size;
00051   if (dimension == 2 && !orient_surface)
00052     matrix_size = 4;
00053   else 
00054     matrix_size = dimension*3;
00055   unsigned num_doubles = num_matrices * matrix_size;
00056   std::ostringstream str;
00057   str << base_name << num_doubles;
00058   
00059   TagHandle handle = mesh->tag_get( str.str().c_str(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00060   
00061     // check tag type
00062   std::string temp_name;
00063   Mesh::TagType temp_type;
00064   unsigned temp_length;
00065   mesh->tag_properties( handle, temp_name, temp_type, temp_length, err );
00066   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00067 
00068   if (temp_type != Mesh::DOUBLE || temp_length != num_doubles)
00069   {
00070     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00071                     "Mismatched type or length for existing tag \"%s\"",
00072                      str.str().c_str() );
00073   }
00074   
00075   return handle;
00076 }

00081 TargetReader::TargetReader( bool orient2d, std::string name )
00082   : tagBaseName(name),
00083     orient2D(orient2d) {}
00084 
00085 TargetReader::~TargetReader()
00086 {
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool TargetReader::get_3D_target( PatchData &pd,
00090                                   size_t element,
00091                                   Sample sample,
00092                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00093                                   MsqError& err )
00094 {
00095     // calculate index of sample in array 
00096   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00097   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00098 
00099   int dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( pd.element_by_index(element).get_element_type() );
00100   if (dim == 2) {
00101     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to read 3D target for surface element", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00102     return false;
00103   }
00104   
00105   TargetReaderData& data = get_data( pd );
00106   if (!data.targets3D.empty() && data.elementIndex == element) {
00107     assert(offset < data.targets3D.size());
00108     W_out = data.targets3D[offset];
00109     return true;
00110   }
00111   const unsigned num_samples = all_samples.num_nodes();
00112   const unsigned handle_idx = num_samples - 1;
00113   
00114     // get the tag handle
00115   const size_t INVALID_HANDLE = (size_t)-1;
00116   if (data.handles3D.size() <= handle_idx)
00117     data.handles3D.resize( handle_idx + 1, (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE );
00118   TagHandle& tag_handle = data.handles3D[handle_idx];
00119   if (tag_handle == (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE) {
00120     tag_handle = get_tag( pd.get_mesh(),
00121                           num_samples, 3,
00122                           tagBaseName.c_str(),
00123                           orient2D,
00124                           err );
00125     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00126     assert(tag_handle != (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE);
00127   }
00128   
00129     // get the tag data
00130   data.targets3D.resize( num_samples );
00131   pd.get_mesh()->tag_get_element_data( tag_handle, 1, 
00132                                        pd.get_element_handles_array() + element,
00133                                        &data.targets3D[0],
00134                                        err );
00135   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00136     data.targets3D.clear();
00137     return false;
00138   }
00139 
00140   data.elementIndex = element;
00141   W_out = data.targets3D[offset];
00142   return true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 bool TargetReader::get_2D_target( PatchData &pd,
00146                                   size_t element,
00147                                   Sample sample,
00148                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00149                                   MsqError& err )
00150 {
00151     // which type of 2D target do we actually have
00152   if (orient2D) {
00153     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00154     return false;
00155   }
00156   
00157     // calculate index of sample in array 
00158   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00159   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00160 
00161   int dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( pd.element_by_index(element).get_element_type() );
00162   if (dim == 3) {
00163     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to read surface target for region element", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00164     return false;
00165   }
00166   
00167   TargetReaderData& data = get_data( pd );
00168   if (!data.targets2D.empty() && data.elementIndex == element) {
00169     assert(offset < data.targets2D.size());
00170     W_out = data.targets2D[offset];
00171     return true;
00172   }
00173   const unsigned num_samples = all_samples.num_nodes();
00174   const unsigned handle_idx = num_samples - 1;
00175   
00176     // get the tag handle
00177   const size_t INVALID_HANDLE = (size_t)-1;
00178   if (data.handles2D.size() <= handle_idx)
00179     data.handles2D.resize( handle_idx + 1, (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE );
00180   TagHandle& tag_handle = data.handles2D[handle_idx];
00181   if (tag_handle == (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE) {
00182     tag_handle = get_tag( pd.get_mesh(),
00183                           num_samples, 2,
00184                           tagBaseName.c_str(),
00185                           orient2D,
00186                           err );
00187     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00188     assert(tag_handle != (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE);
00189   }
00190   
00191     // get the tag data
00192   data.targets2D.resize( num_samples );
00193   pd.get_mesh()->tag_get_element_data( tag_handle, 1, 
00194                                        pd.get_element_handles_array() + element,
00195                                        &data.targets2D[0],
00196                                        err );
00197   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00198     data.targets2D.clear();
00199     return false;
00200   }
00201   
00202   data.elementIndex = element;
00203   W_out = data.targets2D[offset];
00204   return true;
00205 }

00207 bool TargetReader::get_surface_target( PatchData &pd,
00208                                   size_t element,
00209                                   Sample sample,
00210                                   MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00211                                   MsqError& err )
00212 {
00213     // which type of 2D target do we actually have
00214   if (!orient2D) {
00215     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00216     return false;
00217   }
00218   
00219     // calculate index of sample in array 
00220   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00221   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00222 
00223   int dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( pd.element_by_index(element).get_element_type() );
00224   if (dim == 3) {
00225     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to read surface target for region element", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00226     return false;
00227   }
00228   
00229   TargetReaderData& data = get_data( pd );
00230   if (!data.targetsSurface.empty() && data.elementIndex == element) {
00231     assert(offset < data.targetsSurface.size());
00232     W_out = data.targetsSurface[offset];
00233     return true;
00234   }
00235   const unsigned num_samples = all_samples.num_nodes();
00236   const unsigned handle_idx = num_samples - 1;
00237   
00238     // get the tag handle
00239   const size_t INVALID_HANDLE = (size_t)-1;
00240   if (data.handles2D.size() <= handle_idx)
00241     data.handles2D.resize( handle_idx + 1, (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE );
00242   TagHandle& tag_handle = data.handles2D[handle_idx];
00243   if (tag_handle == (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE) {
00244     tag_handle = get_tag( pd.get_mesh(),
00245                           num_samples, 2,
00246                           tagBaseName.c_str(),
00247                           orient2D,
00248                           err );
00249     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00250     assert(tag_handle != (TagHandle)INVALID_HANDLE);
00251   }
00252   
00253     // get the tag data
00254   data.targetsSurface.resize( num_samples );
00255   pd.get_mesh()->tag_get_element_data( tag_handle, 1, 
00256                                        pd.get_element_handles_array() + element,
00257                                        &data.targetsSurface[0],
00258                                        err );
00259   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00260     data.targetsSurface.clear();
00261     return false;
00262   }
00263   
00264   data.elementIndex = element;
00265   W_out = data.targetsSurface[offset];
00266   return true;
00267 }
00268   
00269 void TargetReader::notify_patch_destroyed( TargetReaderData& data )
00270 {
00271   data.handles2D.clear();
00272   data.handles3D.clear();
00273   data.targets3D.clear();
00274   data.targets2D.clear();
00275   data.targetsSurface.clear();
00276 }
00277 
00278 void TargetReader::notify_new_patch( PatchData&, TargetReaderData& data )
00279 {
00280   data.targets3D.clear();
00281   data.targets2D.clear();
00282   data.targetsSurface.clear();
00283 }
00284 
00285 void TargetReader::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& pd, 
00286                                      TargetReaderData& data,
00287                                      PatchData& subpatch,
00288                                      const size_t*,
00289                                      const size_t*,
00290                                      MsqError& err )
00291 {
00292   TargetReaderData& other = get_data(subpatch);
00293   if (other.handles2D.empty() && other.handles3D.empty()) {
00294     other.handles2D = data.handles2D;
00295     other.handles3D = data.handles3D;
00296   }
00297 }
